item.title: Carney Plans to Meet With Xi to Try and Reset Relations
item.description: The leaders of Canada and China met for the first time in eight years to try to reset relations after years of acrimony.

item.title: Trump Calls on Republicans to End Filibuster in Shutdown Fight
item.description: The president said it was time for G.O.P. leaders to get rid of the longstanding rule that means most Senate legislation needs 60 votes to pass.

item.title: At the Supreme Court, Liberal Justices Are Split
item.description: We go inside their strained relationship.

item.title: In Louisiana, Threat of Lost SNAP Food Benefits Is Rattling the Vulnerable
